::Slayer::

Slayer watches an explosion under him, sending another comm to 
Ignatius. "It's fisty. If we're gonna recruit it, we better do it 
quick."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> New Bot
> 
> 
> 
> (The scanners pick up a life form. The pod opens. A white wolf 
steps out.
> She convert to bot mode. She was a tall slender female who was quite
> beautiful. She looks around. She pulls a smoke bomb off her belt. 
She pulls
> a ring out of it, setting it off. She throws it ahead of her, 
checking for
> other bots.)
